title: Bloomberg Markets: Investors Flocking Back to Hedge Funds
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Investors Flocking Back to Hedge Funds
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hema Parmar Hedge Fund Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing how hedge funds saw the biggest jump in demand among asset classes examined in a Credit Suisse Group AG report Tuesday. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
